SELECT IDX , CATEGORY , CRE_NM , TITLE , TARGET_AMT , TOTAL_AMT , START , END , IMG1 , case when (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKE_TB WHERE PJ_IDX = P.IDX AND USER_ID = #{SESSIONID}) = 1 THEN 'heart_fill.svg' ELSE 'heart.svg' END AS HEART
FROM PROJECT_TB P WHERE 1=1
AND END > CURDATE() ORDER BY total_amt / target_amt * 100 DESC
AND START > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 7 day) and END > CURDATE()
AND CURDATE() > DATE_SUB(END,INTERVAL 7 day) and END > CURDATE()
AND START > CURDATE()
AND title like CONCAT('%', #{SEARCH}, '%') AND END > CURDATE()
AND category=#{CATEGORY} and END > CURDATE()
